title: FlexPay Revenue and Customer Recovery Calculator
summary: This page features the FlexPay Revenue and Customer Recovery Calculator, designed to estimate additional revenue and customer growth from their Invisible Recovery solution. It allows users to input various business metrics to forecast financial outcomes.
key_points: FlexPay Revenue and Customer Recovery Calculator
Input fields for active accounts, billing, growth rates, and churn
Compares FlexPay's solution against no solution and in-house solutions
Focuses on recovering failed payments and minimizing churn
